abstract: A Boolean value that indicates whether the connection can configure the capture pipeline to deliver camera intrinsics information.
overview:
## Discussion

You can set this property to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] for a video connection if [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureConnection/isCameraIntrinsicMatrixDeliverySupported] is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], and only before calling the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureSession] [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureSession/startRunning()] method. The default value is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

Camera intrinsics describe the current imaging parameters of a capture device in ways that you can use to render overlays or perform computer vision tasks. If [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], any [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureVideoDataOutput] instance in this connection can include the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CoreMedia/kCMSampleBufferAttachmentKey_CameraIntrinsicMatrix] attachment for each sample buffer it vends.

# isCameraIntrinsicMatrixDeliveryEnabled

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the connection can configure the capture pipeline to deliver camera intrinsics information.

## Declaration

```swift
var isCameraIntrinsicMatrixDeliveryEnabled: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

You can set this property to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] for a video connection if [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureConnection/isCameraIntrinsicMatrixDeliverySupported] is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], and only before calling the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureSession] [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureSession/startRunning()] method. The default value is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

Camera intrinsics describe the current imaging parameters of a capture device in ways that you can use to render overlays or perform computer vision tasks. If [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], any [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureVideoDataOutput] instance in this connection can include the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CoreMedia/kCMSampleBufferAttachmentKey_CameraIntrinsicMatrix] attachment for each sample buffer it vends.

## Delivering camera calibration settings

- **isCameraIntrinsicMatrixDeliverySupported**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the capture connection currently supports delivering camera intrinsics information.
